title: [QUESTION] Compare contrast with JS libraries
body: Q: How does _Skia(Sharp)_ compare contrast with JS libraries like [_Babylon_](https://babylonjs.com) of [_THREE_](https://threejs.org)? Aside from the obvious, I get it, the `CSharp` interop aspects. Also, that the JS libraries are purely JS canvas oriented. But perhaps in a bit more depth, insightfulness. Thank you...
